general.description: A hot magma world, Sirk was once an important trading destination. Ever since the Collective started attacking, however, business to the planet rapidly decayed amid fears of be√Øng destroyed by the terrifying drones.
general.bar: The once-important bar is now in a disheveled state, and its decorations are somewhat dated. Still, a number of patrons, probably mostly locals, continue to visit the establishment.
